document_data.name: Atl-Ollin
document_data.mainbody: '''Atl-Ollin''' was a high priest of [[Azul|Calor]] in [[Nexal]].
document_data.History: Around [[1351 DR]], after a series of portents, [[Naltecona]] gathered all the high priests to ask them what the gods wished. Afterward, Naltecona questioned Atl-Ollin directly, who answered honestly that he did not understand the portents' meaning.
